entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in New Zealand
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information about the COVID-19 situation from the government, health authorities and other trusted sources across New Zealand. For more, visit https://covid19.govt.nz/.

text: @NYGovCuomo My grandmother just told me her roommate at her nursing home Upper East Side Rehab Center is sick with a cough. I confirmed this with nurse, who told me they’re NOT TESTING PATIENTS (I recorded phone convo). The facility had ALREADY had a COVID-19 outbreak. Please help!
